Reason: The configuration option _transientMode is performance-sensitive. This is because it directly impacts the system performance by determining whether to use a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal in the journal() method. Depending on the value assigned to _transientMode and how often the journal() method is called, it can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. The choice between TransientJournal and PersistentJournal can have significant performance implications, as using a TransientJournal may have lower performance but can save on disk space compared to a PersistentJournal.
